content: the christmas caramel is worked in the round on double-pointed needles or using the magic loop technique at the end the caramel is stuffed with yarn scraps or filling **length ** 10 cm \ 4 inches\ **needles ** 3 mm \ us2½\ double-pointed needles or a long circular needle for magic loop **materials ** double sunday by sandnes garn 50 g = 108 m \ 118 yds\ or heavy merino by knitting for olive 50 g = 125 m \ 137 yds\ or peruvian highland wool by filcolana 50 g = 100 m \ 109 yds\ approx 6-10 g for main color light and approx 3-5 g for stripe color dark optionally filling **difficulty ** ★ ★ 2 out of 5 see the classification of difficulty here 1 the white and blue christmas caramel is knitted in double sunday by sandnes garn in the colors almond \ 2511\ and night sky \ 5591\ the white and green christmas caramel is knitted in double sunday by sandnes garn in the colors almond \ 2511\ and matcha \ 9564\ the white and pink christmas caramel is knitted in double sunday by sandnes garn in the colors almond \ 2511\ and shocking pink \ 4626\ the white and burgundy christmas caramel is knitted in heavy merino by knitting for olive in the colors hvede and bordeaux 1 https //www petiteknit com/en/pages/svaerhedsgrad
